mapper.sql: id, ext_type, record_id, content, user_id, name, create_time, update_time, low, praise
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment SET ext_type = #{comment.ext_type}, record_id = #{comment.item_id}, content = #{comment.content}, user_id = #{user_id}, name = #{name}, create_time = NOW(), low = '{}', praise = '{}'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_comment c WHERE c.`ext_type` = #{type} AND c.`record_id` = #{record_id} AND JSON_LENGTH(c.`praise`) = (SELECT MAX(JSON_LENGTH(co.`praise`)) FROM tb_comment co WHERE co.`ext_type` = #{type} AND co.`record_id` = #{record_id} ) LIMIT 0, 1
